comments.text: 鼠鼠川普也好意思出来整活，当时连伊朗连朝鲜都不敢打

data.text:
[tmp]
WORLD NEWS
Trump says US should put ‘Chinese flag on jets and bomb Russia'
Donald Trump said Biden should stop saying US will not attack Russia. “At what point do countries say, 'No, we can't take this massive crime against humanity?' We can't let it happen. We can't let it continue to happen,” Trump said calling NATO a ‘paper tiger’.
整乐子没有人比得上川宝
